item.title: Nand2Tetris Week 2 Notes: Boolean Arithmetic
item.description: An in-depth exploration of Boolean arithmetic, binary numbers, and their applications in digital systems as part of the Nand2Tetris course.

item.title: Nand2Tetris Week 1 Notes
item.description: A comprehensive guide to understanding the basics of Boolean logic, truth tables, and implementing logic gates in the Nand2Tetris course.
